body:
Have boost package provide BOOST_ROOT environment variable

### Rationale

Searching through the packages for examples, I see a lot of them using BOOST_ROOT as part of their builds.  Seems like a nice thing for spack to provide.

### Implementation
Mind if I file a pull request for this via fork to help out with this feature?  should be a 2 liner if I understand spack.
title: BOOST_ROOT
